main.name: Srushti Shah
main.description: Engineering production-grade analytics, knowledge graph pipelines, and ML products that deliver business impact
main.bio: I am a Computer Engineering graduate student at New York University who specializes in applied machine learning, knowledge graph analytics, and scalable data platforms. I love architecting systems that translate research ideas into reliable products—whether that means optimizing inference paths, building lineage-aware data pipelines, or shipping intuitive dashboards.
main.contactmessage: Interested in AI engineering, data platforms, or product collaborations? Let’s talk about how I can help deliver measurable results.

resume.skillmessage: Technologies I rely on to design resilient data products, ship ML features, and accelerate engineering teams.

education.description: Graduate coursework blending AI systems, applied machine learning, and analytics for business impact.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering, Information and Communication Technology (GPA: 8.49 / 10.00)
education.description: Focused on AI, data mining, and large-scale software engineering with strong algorithmic foundations.

work.title: Engineering Intern
work.description: Integrated predictive analytics and data lineage into enterprise-grade knowledge graph products.
highlights: Integrated the CARTE ML system into Voicebox3 by building the CartePrediction class for natural language-driven regression and classification over knowledge graphs.
Created a 6-point evaluation and A/B testing framework to benchmark predictive performance and model quality.
Engineered a high-throughput graph transformation pipeline that streamed 100M+ DataFrame rows into Stardog RDF graphs and PyTorch Geometric formats, improving ingestion scalability by 85%.
Optimized ML inference with CPU-optimized ensemble strategies and threading controls, cutting latency by ~40% while resolving concurrency faults.
Architected granular data lineage with five computation strategies (Schema, Instance, Construct, Intersection, Union), reducing provenance runtime from 10s to under 1s with 92% test coverage.
Built automated MLOps flows for target column detection using LLM prompts and adaptive preprocessing (imputation, encoding), achieving 95% model accuracy on tabular KG extracts.

work.title: Software Development Intern – Frontend
work.description: Delivered production-ready React features for client sites while tightening quality and release speed.
highlights: Implemented 5+ front-end features with React Hooks, React Router, and Bootstrap, reducing delivery timelines by 20% through performance-focused refactors.
Strengthened reliability by adding unit and integration tests, decreasing post-deployment bugs by 30%.
Managed GitLab workflows and resolved 95% of merge conflicts independently to keep releases on track.
Partnered with designers and QA to iterate on UX, lifting user satisfaction by 15% through UAT-driven refinements.

work.company: Bhaskaracharya National Institute for Space Applications and Geo-informatics
work.title: Research Intern
work.description: Built data pipelines and predictive models to study air quality trends across India.
highlights: Preprocessed and analyzed air quality data from 146 cities (2013–2022) to surface trends for forecasting.
Implemented regression, decision tree, and neural network models, achieving MAE of 0.661.
Configured CUDA and cuDNN to shrink model training time from 3 hours to 30 minutes on large datasets.

projects.title: AI Compliance & Risk Review System
projects.category: Multi-agent compliance automation with Next.js dashboards, PostgreSQL schema, and REST APIs for risk scoring and reporting.

projects.title: Restaurant Recommender System
projects.category: Content-based recommendations with FastAPI, Dockerized deployment, and Prometheus/Grafana monitoring.

projects.title: Voicebox3 Predictive Analytics Integration
projects.category: LangChain-based conversational analytics with CARTE ML and lineage-aware knowledge graph transformations.

projects.title: BookMyShow Clone
projects.category: Ticketing UI clone with React, modern routing, and responsive theming.
